languages.text: "Паскаль, что думаешь ты? Эта сущность — благой машинный дух или чудовище?"

traits.locale_text: "Паскаль, что думаешь ты? Эта сущность — благой машинный дух или чудовище?"

languages.text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, что думаешь ты? Эта сущность — благой машинный дух или чудовище?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"
"Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"
"Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"
"Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"
"Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

languages.text: 「パスカル、これに関して君の利益は何だ？この存在は慈悲深い機械精霊なのか、それとも怪物なのか？」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、これに関して君の利益は何だ？この存在は慈悲深い機械精霊なのか、それとも怪物なのか？」

languages.text: “帕斯卡，你对此是怎么想的？这个实体是仁慈的机魂，还是某种怪物？”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，你对此是怎么想的？这个实体是仁慈的机魂，还是某种怪物？”

languages.text: "Pasqal, wie ist Eure Einschätzung? Ist diese Entität ein friedlicher Maschinengeist oder ein Monster?"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, wie ist Eure Einschätzung? Ist diese Entität ein friedlicher Maschinengeist oder ein Monster?"

languages.text: « Pasqal, qu'en pensez-vous ? Cette entité est-elle un esprit de la machine bienveillant ou un monstre ? »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, qu'en pensez-vous ? Cette entité est-elle un esprit de la machine bienveillant ou un monstre ? »

languages.text: «Pasqal, ¿qué opina usted de esta entidad? ¿Se trata de un espíritu máquina benévolo o es más bien un monstruo?».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, ¿qué opina usted de esta entidad? ¿Se trata de un espíritu máquina benévolo o es más bien un monstruo?».

languages.text: "Pasqal, bu hususta ne düşünüyorsun? Sence bu varlık, müşfik bir makine ruhu mu yoksa canavar mı?"
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, what is your take on this? Is this entity a benevolent machine spirit or a monster?"

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, bu hususta ne düşünüyorsun? Sence bu varlık; müşfik bir makine ruhu mu, yoksa canavarın teki mi?"
